column5: If this doesn't get you pumped up for the upcoming ski/snowboard season, I don't know what will  The link is safe.  If you've ever skied or snowboarded, this will blow your mind.
i think i pee'd a little there...
i peed a lot Gotta have lotsa guts !!!!!!!!!!!!!or gotta be really nuts
Wow now that is crazy. Great Vid!!
That would be alot of fun! If you don't kill your self!
Sweet. Great tune to go with it.
more to do with flying then skiing but wow
Oh man, that's incredible! As someone who was skiing almost before walking, and later started parachuting, that just blows me away!  VERY cool!
Pretty awesome way to interact with a mountain.
absolutedly AWESOME vid, my skiing consists of Kirby and Blue Mountain, so that is mindblowing alright

Another day sitting behind a desk and a monitor watching others adrenaline flow   SIGH!  It is true what they say about having to take risks to reap rewards.  Ill stick with the snowboard on the ground i think, that in itself is enough ..........i think
That's cool. I would do that!
I have no interest in doing that but it was very cool to watch Thanx for posting it Richard
ok that was a cool video but I cant help but to think that it is death waiting to happen haha  cheers!
